item.title: MIUI OS1.0.21.0.UMPMIXM Fastboot update for POCO X5 5G Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO X5 5G Global

Codename: moonstone

Version: OS1.0.21.0.UMPMIXM | 14.0

Size: 6.0 GB

MD5: 382ec9f982e27fbd0f3401dade10069a

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Unexpected reboots occurred
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
